definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: A nurse anesthetist unearthed a nest.
sentences.chinese: 一名護理麻醉師掘出一套器具。

sentences.english: Dr Wong also has a medical doctorate and is a qualified Anaesthetist .
sentences.chinese: 黃志明博士還擁有醫學博士學位並獲得了麻醉師資格。

sentences.english: Only after the anaesthetist gave the patient an anaesthetic, could the operation be conducted.
sentences.chinese: 在麻醉師給病人施行麻醉以後，手術才能進行。

sentences.english: My late father was an anaesthetist and I occasionally attended conferences with him.
sentences.chinese: 我的父親是名麻醉師，我有時跟他去參加會議。

sentences.english: The anaesthetist can change the drug to deal with this.
sentences.chinese: 該麻醉師可以改變藥物的處理與此有關。

sentences.english: It is essential that the anesthesiologist continuously assess the depth of anesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 麻醉師必須持續不斷地評估麻醉深度。

sentences.english: The Medical Practitioner Band IV consultation benefit now includes some anesthetist consultations .
sentences.chinese: 一些麻醉師被包括在等級IV的醫生會診保障內。

sentences.english: In-theatre training of anaesthetists in a teaching hospital: has it changed over 10 years?
sentences.chinese: 教學醫院手術室麻醉師培訓在過去十年有變化嗎？

sentences.english: In most hospitals, nurse anesthetists work in a team approach.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數醫院，護士麻醉師工作隊的辦法。

sentences.english: The anesthetist gave me an anesthetic.
If you any questions about anaesthesia, you can ask your anaesthetist .
sentences.chinese: 如果您對麻醉有什麼問題，都可以問您的麻醉師。

sentences.english: Perhaps then his anesthesiologist will become interested.
sentences.chinese: 也許到那時，麻醉師就會對此感興趣了。

sentences.english: An anesthesiologist is a doctor specially trained to give anesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 麻醉師是專門訓練來給病人實施麻醉的醫生。

definition: Kohl (name)/Helmut Kohl (1930-2017), German CDU politician, Chancellor 1982-1998
Davos (Swiss ski resort)/Davos world economic forum (WEF)
Macbeth (name)/Macbeth, 1606 tragedy by William Shakespeare 莎士比亞|莎士比亚
